textBefore_run: Welcome to main experiment. Everything will be the same as in the practice trials except no feedback will be provided after each trial. One run takes around 7 minutes. When ready, press 'space.' Good luck!
Done with run 1. Feel free to take a short break. Press 'space' when ready to continue.
